mapper.sql: id, frame_process_cfg_id, frame_process_code, version_id, flag_deleted, create_person, create_time, frame_process_status,current_process_step_id,purchase_create_person
mapper.select: SELECT o.wp_frame_process_id id,p.current_process_step_id currentProcessStepId,o.wp_frame_process_id frameProcessCfgId FROM fdp_fault_dispatch_order o LEFT JOIN wp_frame_process p ON o.wp_frame_process_id=p.id WHERE o.id=#{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND p.flag_deleted=0 GROUP BY o.id
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into wp_frame_process
id,
frame_process_cfg_id,
frame_process_code,
version_id,
flag_deleted,
create_person,
purchase_create_person,
create_time,
frame_process_status,
current_process_step_id,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{frameProcessCfgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{frameProcessCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{versionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{flagDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
#{createPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{purchaseCreatePerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{frameProcessStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{currentProcessStepId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update wp_frame_process
frame_process_cfg_id = #{frameProcessCfgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
frame_process_code = #{frameProcessCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version_id = #{versionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
flag_deleted = #{flagDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
create_person = #{createPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
purchase_create_person=#{purchaseCreatePerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
frame_process_status = #{frameProcessStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
current_process_step_id = #{currentProcessStepId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
